name: check
description:
Check is a unit testing framework for C. It features a simple interface
for defining unit tests, putting little in the way of the developer.
Tests are run in a separate address space, so both assertion failures
and code errors that cause segmentation faults or other signals can be
caught. Test results are reportable in the following: Subunit, TAP, XML,
and a generic logging format.

dependent_to.name: libpipeline
dependent_to.description:
libpipeline is a C library for manipulating pipelines of subprocesses in
a flexible and convenient way.

dependent_to.name: py-pygpu
dependent_to.description: Python packge for the libgpuarray C library.

dependent_to.name: procenv
dependent_to.description:
A command-line tool that displays as much detail about itself and its
environment as possible. It can be used as a test tool, to understand
the type of environment a process runs in, and for comparing system
environments.

dependent_to.name: libgpuarray
dependent_to.description:
Make a common GPU ndarray(n dimensions array) that can be reused by all
projects that is as future proof as possible, while keeping it easy to
use for simple need/quick test.

dependent_to.name: libmo-unpack
dependent_to.description:
A library for handling the WGDOS and RLE compression schemes used in UM
files.
